mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1946 Repertory Schedule
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Schedule for 1946 shows at the Barter Theatre. Productions include: State of the Union, July 30-31 | My Sister Eileen, Aug 1-2 | Arms and the Man, Aug 3-4 | State of the Union, Aug 5-7 | Arms and the Man, Aug 8-9 | State of the Union, Aug 10 | Women, Aug 13-14 | State of the Union, Aug 15-17 | Much Ado About Nothing, Aug 20-23 | Women, Aug 24. Drama Festival: Aug 26-Sep 7.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia

This digital surrogate is made publicly available by the Barter Theatre for use in research, teaching, private study, and other educational purposes. Responsibility for any use of these materials rests exclusively with the user. When using this item, users should give proper credit to the owner of the original object as well as to Virginia Tech Libraries.
